Package org.ServerGui.Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSceneController
    Every Scene created needs its own Controller for its GUI.
    AssignPlayersSceneController
    When the host starts a game players and spectators need to be assigned via the AssignPlayer scene.
    AssignPlayersTournamentSceneController
    When the host starts a game players and spectators need to be assigned via the AssignPlayer scene.
    ConfigSceneController
    Controller for scene Config.
    CreateGameSceneController
    Controller for scene CreateGame.
    CreateTournamentSceneController
    Controller for scene CreateTournament.
    DisplayedScene
    Container class to reference a Scene to its AbstractSceneController.
    LobbySceneController
    Controller for scene Lobby.
    NetworkController  
    NewOrSavedGameSceneController
    Controller for scene NewOrSavedGame.
    NewOrSavedTournamentSceneController
    Controller for scene NewOrSavedTournament.
    RankingSceneController
    Controller for scene Ranking.
    SelectWinnerSceneController
    Controller for scene SelectWinner.
    SuperController
    The SuperController is the general entry point of the client.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SceneMapping
    Every Scene is listed here in order to make an easy readable mapping
